steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7be1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49ak6","text":"Assess the quality of the pools using a Bioanalyzer or an equivalent instrument to see the fragment size distribution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm00q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvg8a","text":"If there is an excess of small fragments in the library, clean up one or more times (start from step 11) using 0,65x ratio Ampure beads, elute in   and transfer   to a new tube before assessing size distribution again. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"42","error":false,"guid":"0598AB4CA3C311EDA2B90A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"0598ABCFA3C311EDA2B90A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

of PB to a new eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"52tq2","text":"10) Transfer   (per reaction) of the tube on a magnet for   or until clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":12,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3df8v","text":"13) Remove and 80% ethanol to cover the beads without mixing and incubate   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":13,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cef8q","text":"15) Remove the
